translation.en: I hereby call this Thompson family meeting to order.
translation.it: Dichiaro aperta la riunione della famiglia Thompson.

translation.en: Now, if you all please turn to slide one,
you'll see that a third car can actually save the family money over the long run.
translation.it: vedrete che una terza auto ci permetterebbe di risparmiare.

translation.en: Mine's just GIFs of baby porcupines eating corn on the cob.
translation.it: Io vedo una gif di un istrice che mangia mais.

translation.en: Because I already know your views on increasing our carbon footprint, so your presentation is just Best of Baby Animals.
translation.it: So che ti preoccupa l'impatto ambientale, quindi a te ho messo foto di cuccioli.

translation.en: Oh. Good thinking.
So, Mom, Dad, if you'll please turn to slide two,
translation.it: Mamma, papà, alla seconda pagina vedrete

translation.en: you'll see that my learner's permit driving record is blemish-free.
translation.it: che il mio curriculum di guida è impeccabile.

translation.en: Did you hire character witnesses again?
translation.it: Hai di nuovo assunto finti testimoni?

translation.en: If that's your driver's ed teacher, he's not staying for dinner.
translation.it: L'istruttore di guida non può restare a cena.

translation.en: Where were you? I've been waiting at the train station all day.
translation.it: Dov'eravate? Ho aspettato in stazione tutto il giorno.

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Nick. Nicole?
Nicole Patterson? I'm here to live with you.
Okay, what?
You didn't get the memo?
Was this an actual or metaphorical memo?
They said they called and emailed.
-[Nick sobs] -Okay, sweetie. Just tell us what happened.
What happened is...
my parents...
died in a car accident six months ago,
translation.it: ...sono morti in un incidente sei mesi fa

translation.en: and I've been in foster care until they could find some relatives,
translation.it: e sono stata in affidamento mentre cercavano parenti.

translation.en: and then they said they found my dad's second cousin twice removed,
translation.it: Poi hanno trovato questo cugino alla lontana

translation.en: or something, and you were supposed to pick me up at the train station.
translation.it: di mio padre che doveva venire in stazione.

translation.en: You don't know what I'm talking about. Now I'll have to go back to foster care!
translation.it: Non mi capite! Dovrò tornarmene in affidamento.

translation.en: Hang on a second. Nobody's making you go anywhere.
We'll get to the bottom of this. You just never clarified if the memo was real.
translation.it: Risolveremo tutto, ma prima spiegaci della nota.

translation.en: Here's the letter from the state.
Here's a picture of my great-grandma with, I guess, your grandma, or something.
translation.it: Una foto della bisnonna con tua nonna, credo.

translation.en: Oh, Grandma Liza!
And they gave me this family tree. Oh God, this is a total nightmare!
translation.it: E l'albero genealogico. Dio, è un incubo.

translation.en: Okay, let's take a deep breath.
Molly, why don't you take...
-Nick! -Nick...
to get something to eat while we sort this out.
Hi, I'm Molly. Do you like quinoa?
translation.it: Ciao, sono Molly. Ti piace la quinoa?

translation.en: Or is this more of an ice cream situation?
translation.it: O è più una situazione da gelato?

translation.en: Again, I'm so, so sorry about the mix-up, folks.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per il disguido, signori.

translation.en: I have got egg on my face.
Oh, this is more than egg. This is a quiche.
translation.it: Direi che è più una quiche.

translation.en: You quiched us.
Mistakes happen. Don't beat yourself up about it.
translation.it: Gli errori accadono, non si abbatta.

translation.en: Bye-bye.
Can you believe that this social services coordinator was coordinating with another Ed Thompson?
translation.it: Ti rendi conto che l'assistente sociale ha contattato un mio omonimo?

translation.en: I feel so generic!
-I wish I had a cool nickname. -Ooh, how about Laser?
-No. -Yes.
[sighs] All right, well...
this is, uh, quite a shock.
We were literally caught with our pants down.
translation.it: Siamo letteralmente con le braghe calate.

translation.en: That's literally not what literally means.
Irregardless...
we are problem solvers.
We'll make this work.
So where's my room?
Well, that's a problem. I have no idea.
Nick can stay with me in my room.
translation.it: Può stare in stanza con me.

translation.en: Seriously? I'm not even allowed in your room.
translation.it: Non ci fai entrare nemmeno me.

translation.en: Come on, I'll show you where you can put your stuff
translation.it: Ti mostro dove mettere la roba e come seguirmi su Snap e Insta,

translation.en: and how to follow me on Snap and Insta. Not Facebook.
translation.it: Ti mostro dove mettere la roba e come seguirmi su Snap e Insta, non Facebook.

translation.en: Mom joined.
So this is going to be our room. That sofa pulls out into a bed.
translation.it: Eccoci qui. Quello è un divano letto,

translation.en: But don't worry, it's more comfortable than it looks.
You're being so nice to me.
I really appreciate this.
Hey, I care about helping people.
It's kind of my thing.
My thing is watching old Rocky and Bullwinkle cartoons, but I like your thing, too.
translation.it: La mia è guardare i cartoni, ma mi piace anche la tua.

translation.en: You can put your stuff here, and the Wi-Fi is "ThompsonsRule!" All one word, cap T, cap R, exclam.
translation.it: La password del Wi-Fi è "ThompsonRule!" con T e R maiuscole e punto esclamativo.

translation.en: I know.
Hey, can I take a shower or something?
I haven't changed my clothes in, like, two days.
translation.it: Non mi cambio da due giorni.

translation.en: Wow, that's super real.
The bathroom's in through there.
Thanks...
for everything.
I'm in.
I really like her.
Of course you like her. She's an orphan.
Your friend Becky is going to be so jealous.
translation.it: La tua amica Becky sarà gelosa.

translation.en: You must be tired of her hogging all the attention with her brother's tumor.
translation.it: Sempre a parlare del tumore di suo fratello.

translation.en: -I don't care what Becky thinks. -Hey.
Maybe you can dress Nick up like a hobo and take selfies down at the dump.
translation.it: Vestila da senzatetto e fattici un selfie alla discarica.

translation.en: So, she's staying?
I'm just gonna say what your father and I are both thinking.
Nick can't stay here.
Wait, what?
That's not what I was thinking. I was thinking the exact opposite.
Are you serious?
Because you're talking about raising another child, like, forever.
translation.it: Stiamo parlando di un altro figlio, per sempre.

translation.en: Not forever. Just 'til she's been with us long enough to need therapy.
translation.it: Non per sempre. Finché non la faremo impazzire.

translation.en: That sounds like a worthy goal, but I'm busy right now, with the cookbook and restaurant.
translation.it: Bell'obiettivo, ma sono presa dal libro e dal ristorante.

translation.en: And the auditions for Top Chef coming up.
Believe me, no one can forget because you talk about it all the time.
translation.it: Tranquilla, lo sappiamo, ne parli di continuo.

translation.en: Guys.
Mom's got a point. I mean, she's just being realistic here.
Exactly. Look, I get that Nick's situation is sad.
translation.it: Esatto. Capisco che abbia una situazione triste.

translation.en: Super sad.
So sad.
But why does that have to make our situation sad?
translation.it: Ma perché deve rendere tristi anche noi?

translation.en: Because she's family.
She's such a distant relative, we could legally get married.
translation.it: Così alla lontana che potrei sposarla.

translation.en: Um, ew.
So what, you just wanna kick her out?
No. No one's saying kick her out.
I'm just saying, why does she have to stay... here?
translation.it: Mi chiedo solo perché dovrebbe restare qui.

translation.en: I'll tell you why she has to stay here. Because she's a child who needs us.
translation.it: Ti dico io perché. Perché ha bisogno di noi.

translation.en: Do I want another kid? No, I don't even want these two.
translation.it: Anche se già non sopporto loro.

translation.en: Just a joke, guys.
I love you so much, so much, but the point is...
translation.it: Vi voglio tanto bene, ma il punto è...

translation.en: that she's my second cousin, and she's already been removed twice.
translation.it: ...che è mia parente e ha già subito due rimozioni.

translation.en: We can't do it to her a third time.
Yeah, I don't think that's what that means.
It doesn't matter. We can't kick her out on the street. That's not who we are.
Dad's right. We have to do the right thing here.
translation.it: Ha ragione. Facciamo la cosa giusta.

translation.en: I vote she stays.
This isn't a reality show. You don't get to vote her on or off the island.
translation.it: Non è un reality, non siamo su un'isola.

translation.en: Everyone's opinion matters. And thank you, Jeremy. I'm glad to see you coming around on this.
translation.it: Ma ha ragione. E grazie per esserti ricreduto.

translation.en: Yeah, you know, me too.
Because raising a child is expensive and we'll have to make sacrifices.
translation.it: Crescere un figlio è costoso e dovremo fare sacrifici.

translation.en: And first to go will be that new car you wanted.
You know, and for the record, I was gonna say yes.
translation.it: Per la quale avrei detto di sì.

translation.en: Seriously?
I change my vote. I change my vote.
I vote for the car.
You can't change your vote.
[Liz] Wait. This is a tie,
-and the tie goes to the runner. -[Jeremy] What does that even mean?
So does she want Spanish or French?
You can give her Klingon for all I care. This is just temporary.
translation.it: Va bene anche Klingon. È temporaneo.

translation.en: So Spanish?
[Nick] Wow.
Looks like you're a big deal around here.
Yeah, I know.
Slow your roll.
You're sophomore class rep, not King of the North.
translation.it: Sei un rappresentante, mica il Re del Nord.

translation.en: Nick, sweetie...
I know this is a difficult situation,
and you could probably use some sort of inspirational speech right now.
translation.it: richiederebbe un discorso motivazionale da parte mia.

translation.en: So...
hold onto your dreams and...
reach for the stars...
and seize the day.
Bye.
So Jeremy's kind of full of himself.
Totally. He even keeps a future resume on his phone
translation.it: Davvero. Tiene un CV futuro sul cellulare

translation.en: to remind him of all the things he needs to accomplish by the time he's 35.
translation.it: per spronarsi ad avere successo entro i 35 anni.

translation.en: Spoiler alert, he becomes president.
Well, he doesn't seem to like me.
I guess he just doesn't want some sketchy foster kid living in his house.
translation.it: Forse non vuole una losca orfana in casa.

translation.en: Hey,
just because you haven't been afforded the same opportunities we have,
translation.it: solo perché non hai avuto le nostre opportunità

translation.en: doesn't make you sketchy.
Oh, my God, it means so much to hear you say that.
I can really tell you care.
That's my gift.
Well, I wish everyone saw it that way.
Think you could talk to Jeremy for me?
I totally would, honest,
but Jeremy only cares about Jeremy.
Sorry.
Big news, everyone.
This is Nick.
She's come to live with us because...
her parents died in a car crash.
So you're like... a for real orphan?
Uh... yeah, I guess so.
Wow.
-Nick'll want to join our volunteer squad. -Your what?
translation.it: - Si unirà alla squadra volontarie. - Cosa?

translation.en: We volunteer at soup kitchens, hospitals, old folks' homes.
We're kind of Insta-famous.
Wow. You guys are super woke.
Totally.
Oh, wow, Molly. I just noticed.
You're wearing a top from a major trans-national corporate retailer.
translation.it: che indossi la maglia di una catena transnazionale.

translation.en: I am?
We're only shopping at Helping the Homeless Thrift Stores now.
translation.it: Noi compriamo vestiti usati da Aiuta i Senzatetto.

translation.en: You know, #childlabor.
Actually, Helping the Homeless only donates nine percent of its profits to the homeless.
translation.it: In realtà, Aiuta i Senzatetto dona solo il nove percento ai senzatetto.

translation.en: Its CEO lives in Aspen.
translation.it: Il suo A.D. vive ad Aspen.

translation.en: And true fact,
supporting clothes manufacturers in developing nations
translation.it: sostenere la manifattura nei Paesi poveri

translation.en: lifts millions out of poverty every year.
translation.it: salva milioni di persone dalla povertà.

translation.en: [stammers] I knew that.
You know what? I'll talk to Jeremy and see what I can do.
translation.it: Parlo con Jeremy, vediamo che possiamo fare.

translation.en: Okay, people,
let's take out your chloroform and prepare to anesthetize your frogs.
translation.it: prendiamo il cloroformio e anestetizziamo le rane.

translation.en: Stand with me to save the frogs!
What do we want? Animal rights!
When do we want it? Now!
Point of order, I move we table this and send it to committee.
You're not supposed to be in here. Student council members only.
translation.it: Gli studenti non possono stare qui.

translation.en: We're trying to pass a critical dance budget.
Spotify and five bucks worth of streamers...
translation.it: Spotify e una cassa da cinque dollari.

translation.en: Problem solved.
Now come talk in the hallway.
Don't underestimate the work we do on student council. It benefits the whole school.
translation.it: Non sottovalutare il nostro lavoro. Aiutiamo la scuola.

translation.en: Says the dictator who canceled our meals on wheels program.
translation.it: Dice chi ha cancellato il programma di beneficenza.

translation.en: Because the insurance was cost-prohibitive.
They could've all come to the ice cream social if you hadn't staged a protest.
translation.it: Avremmo offerto loro il gelato, se non aveste protestato.

translation.en: Because ice cream isn't fair to the lactose intolerant.
translation.it: Perché ci sono gli intolleranti al lattosio.

translation.en: And, uh, speaking of intolerant, why are you being such a jerk to Nick?
translation.it: A proposito di intolleranti, perché fai lo stronzo con Nick?

translation.en: There's something weird about that girl.
You're just being judgmental. Besides, Dad said everything was legit.
translation.it: Sono solo pregiudizi. E poi papà ha detto che è tutto vero.

translation.en: I'm not buying it. Girls don't just show up on your doorstep.
translation.it: Non ci credo, le ragazze non piovono dal cielo.

translation.en: Well, not yours.
Admit it, all you care about is getting your stupid car.
translation.it: Ammettilo, a te interessa solo dell'auto.

translation.en: Which, by the way, is killing our planet, thank you very much.
translation.it: Che uccide il pianeta, grazie mille.

translation.en: And all you care about is your social media blowing up because your latest pet project happens to be a human.
translation.it: A te interessa la popolarità sui social. E il tuo ultimo progetto è umano.

translation.en: That's offensive.
I care about making the world a better place.
translation.it: Voglio che il mondo sia un posto migliore.

translation.en: Becky's the one turning everything into a competition.
translation.it: È Becky che trasforma tutto in una gara.

translation.en: Look,
promise me you'll try and be nice to Nick.
translation.it: prometti che sarai gentile con lei.

translation.en: The only thing I can promise you
is I'm gonna find out what's really going on with her.
translation.it: di scoprire le sue vere intenzioni.

translation.en: Where is your new best friend, anyway?
How did you like my performance yesterday?
Well, to be honest, Dorothy, it was a bit sloppy.
What if they figured out that you and Sam are my real foster parents?
translation.it: Se avessero capito che siete i miei genitori adottivi?

translation.en: Your pictures are online in the state database.
translation.it: Le vostre foto sono nel database.

translation.en: Well, obviously, they didn't look.
But you could've at least worn a disguise.
My disguise was a pantsuit.
It's true. She never wears those.
Listen...
How's the plan going?
Good. They don't suspect anything.
They better not, after all the money we spent on the documents. You know how much a fake court order costs?
translation.it: Meno male, visto quanto ho speso in documenti. Sai quanto costano?

translation.en: Yeah. I can get one in an hour for 30 bucks.
That would've saved me $500!
It still seems like it's an awful lot of effort just to rob a random family.
translation.it: Mi sembra molto sforzo per derubare una famiglia a caso.

translation.en: Really, it's too much effort for a $50,000 score?
translation.it: Dici che è troppo per 50.000 dollari?

translation.en: They have two high-end cars,
jewelry, watches, silverware.
And with me on the inside,
there's no messy break-in, no alarms, no surprises.
translation.it: niente allarmi, sorprese e porte forzate.

translation.en: Okay, so how do you plan to knock 'em out?
Don't worry. Leave it to me. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
translation.it: Ci penso io. Vi farò sapere quando sono pronta.

translation.en: You're already ready. In and out, easy-peasy. That's the plan.
translation.it: Sei già pronta. Dentro e fuori, il piano era questo.

translation.en: I'm on the inside,
so I make the call.
And we clean them out
when I say so.
And can I borrow 20 bucks?
You would not believe what they charge for a latte at this school.
Okay, listen up, people. We are doing the orecchiette with a pork fennel sausage.
translation.it: Ascoltate, oggi orecchiette con salsiccia al finocchietto.

translation.en: The special is a brown-sugar ricotta and egg raviolo.
translation.it: Poi raviolo di ricotta allo zucchero e uovo.

translation.en: Okay, we open in two hours, so get busy cooking or...
translation.it: Apriamo fra due ore. Al lavoro o...

translation.en: [all] Get busy collecting unemployment.
Nick, what are you doing here?
Well, back at the foster home, all the kids had to pull their weight.
translation.it: Quando ero in affidamento, dovevamo contribuire.

translation.en: So I thought I could help out. I know my way around restaurants.
translation.it: Ho pensato di aiutarti, conosco i ristoranti.

translation.en: That is so thoughtful slash depressing. But thanks, everything's under control here.
translation.it: È sia gentile che deprimente, ma ho tutto sotto controllo.

translation.en: Does that look like fennel to you?
Sorry, I'm obviously too busy to babysit.
translation.it: Non posso farti da babysitter ora.

translation.en: Is everyone here completely incompetent?
Cut that.
Wow, that's impressive.
Where did you learn to do that?
I was a cocktail waitress in Vegas for a couple years.
translation.it: Ho fatto la cameriera a Las Vegas.

translation.en: Kidding.
I told you, I have some experience in restaurants.
translation.it: Ti ho detto che ho esperienza nei ristoranti.

translation.en: Besides, I like working.
It makes me feel... useful.
Okay, I guess we could use some help around here.
But if the child labor people show up, you are 18.
translation.it: Ma se te lo chiedono, hai 18 anni.

translation.en: Oh, hey.
How was your day?
What do you mean?
I don't know, isn't that like a standard question kids ask their dad?
translation.it: Non è una cosa normale da chiedere al proprio padre?

translation.en: Maybe in 1955, but not my kids.
translation.it: Forse nel 1955, ma non per i miei figli.

translation.en: Well, their loss.
Actually...
to tell you the truth, I did have quite a day.
You see, I'm a senior loan officer at a bank, I have to decide who to give loans to.
translation.it: Mi occupo di prestiti in banca e decido a chi concederli.

translation.en: That sounds really interesting.
It does?
Yeah, I mean, don't you get all sorts of fascinating people coming into your bank all the time?
translation.it: Incontrerai tante persone affascinanti, lavorando in una banca.

translation.en: Actually, yes, I do.
And they must have all kinds of stories to tell,
trying to buy a house or start a business.
translation.it: vorranno comprare casa o mettersi in proprio.

translation.en: If you think about it,
you're kind of in the dream business...
making people's dreams come true.
Wow.
You really get me.
It's just, my dad got a loan to start a business once.
translation.it: Mio padre chiese un prestito per un'attività.

translation.en: He worked hard his whole life, and I remember when I was, I don't know, maybe just like four or five...
translation.it: Aveva sempre lavorato tanto e io avevo forse quattro o cinque anni.

translation.en: he came home one night with a big cake
translation.it: Tornò a casa una sera con una torta

translation.en: with white frosting and these little pink flowers on top.
translation.it: con la glassa bianca e i fiorellini rosa.

translation.en: You should have seen the look in his eye.
I remember it like it was yesterday. He was proud.
translation.it: Lo ricordo come fosse ieri. Era orgoglioso.

translation.en: And so was I.
I have seen that look many times.
There's one lady who wants to open a yoga studio.
-She-- -[cell phone beeps]
Can you hold that thought? I've gotta answer this message about my...
translation.it: Puoi aspettare un attimo? Mi chiedono una cosa di...

translation.en: math homework.
Don't worry about it. I'm terrible at math, and I work at a bank.
translation.it: Tranquilla. Io non la so e lavoro in banca.

translation.en: That's what calculators are for.
Oh, good.
You got my text.
So, what's your real name?
Nicole Patterson is my real name.
Then, uh, who's Nicole Masipag?
That's also my name.
After my parents died...
I sometimes used my mom's last name.
translation.it: a volte ho usato il cognome di mamma.

translation.en: I don't know why.
I guess I just wanted something to remember her by.
What gives you the right to go through my stuff?
translation.it: Perché frughi tra le mie cose?

translation.en: Well, technically, it's Molly's room, so you have no real expectation of privacy here.
translation.it: Sei in camera di Molly, non puoi aspettarti privacy.

translation.en: Why do you hate me so much?
I don't hate you.
I just don't trust you.
Hey, I get it.
You're obviously super-smart, in a serial killer kind of way.
translation.it: Sei molto intelligente, quasi in stile serial killer.

translation.en: Uh, thanks?
And you're a natural leader.
So you think it's your job to protect everyone.
translation.it: Quindi pensi di dover proteggere tutti.

translation.en: But you don't have to worry about me.
I'm not trying to cause a disturbance in the Force. Sorry.
translation.it: Non sono una perturbazione nella forza. Scusa.

translation.en: I saw your Star Wars pajamas in the laundry.
translation.it: Ho visto il pigiama di Star Wars.

translation.en: You're smooth. You're a lot smarter than you seem.
translation.it: Sei molto più furba di quanto non sembri.

translation.en: Wow.
Rude.
Look, I know this isn't just about me ruining that new car for you.
translation.it: So che non riguarda solo la macchina.

translation.en: Maybe you're just afraid of sharing everything else you do have
translation.it: Forse hai paura di condividere quello che hai

translation.en: with someone you don't know.
I don't know what you're up to, but I'm gonna find out.
translation.it: Non so che intenzioni hai, ma lo scoprirò.

translation.en: I'm not up to anything.
I'm just a girl who needs a family.
translation.it: Ho solo bisogno di una famiglia.

translation.en: Are we good?
Oh, we're far from good... Nick.
Dorothy, it's me. I'm pulling the trigger.
translation.it: Dorothy, sono io. Entriamo in azione.

translation.en: Tell Sam tonight's the night I knock them out. I'll text you when they're unconscious.
translation.it: Di' a Sam che si fa stasera. Io li stendo. Ti scrivo quando dormono.

translation.en: I don't care if it's Armed Forces Week on Wheel of Fortune!
translation.it: Non mi importa della Ruota della Fortuna,

translation.en: Just record it!
[Ed] So...
how was your day?
What do you mean?
That's exactly what I said when Nick asked me. Man.
translation.it: Proprio quello che ho risposto io a Nick.

translation.en: Is it possible that we are so self-absorbed we don't even recognize it when someone takes an interest in our lives?
translation.it: Siamo così distratti da non capire quando qualcuno si interessa?

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you and your little ward had some time for a tête-à-tête, but I'm trying to get dinner ready. I could use help.
translation.it: Mi fa piacere che tu abbia legato con lei, ma mi serve aiuto con la cena.

translation.en: Yeah, Nick's got me thinking. I mean...
translation.it: Sì, Nick mi ha fatto pensare. Insomma,

translation.en: sometimes I feel like we are strangers living in the same house.
translation.it: a volte sembriamo estranei nella stessa casa.

translation.en: I mean, shouldn't we care more about the little things?
Yeah, that sounds great, but I don't know how to make that happen.
translation.it: Sarebbe bello, ma come si fa?

translation.en: Neither do I, but maybe we can figure it out.
translation.it: Non lo so, ma magari possiamo capirlo.

translation.en: Remember, we're a team. You're the brain, I'm the heart.
translation.it: Siamo la squadra: tu la testa e io il cuore.

translation.en: Together, we make the Thompson body run like clockwork.
translation.it: Insieme, la famiglia va come un treno.

translation.en: Yeah, but why do I always have to be the brain?
translation.it: Ma perché sempre io la testa?

translation.en: What's wrong with the brain? Being the brain is a compliment.
Well, sometimes I wanna be the heart. The heart is the fun job. Everyone loves the heart.
translation.it: A volte vorrei essere il cuore. Il cuore piace a tutti.

translation.en: Nobody likes the brain. The brain makes you do your homework and empty the dishwasher,
translation.it: A nessuno piace la testa, perché fa fare i compiti

translation.en: while the heart gets to go out for ice cream and take in stray children.
translation.it: mentre il cuore va a prendere il gelato e adotta randagi.

translation.en: I'll get it.
It'd better not be another stray child.
Thanks.
What's this?
It's called "pizza."
It's Italian for "food."
I know you're used to fending for yourself, but I made dinner.
translation.it: Ma io sto preparando la cena.

translation.en: What's the special occasion?
Did someone die?
No, it's Nick's first real dinner with us.
translation.it: È la prima cena di Nick con noi.

translation.en: You did this all for me?
-You don't eat together every night? -[Liz] Hell no.
translation.it: Non lo fate sempre? Oh, no.

translation.en: But if you wanna to eat your pizza in your room, that's fine.
translation.it: Ma se vuoi mangiare in camera...

translation.en: I mean, I cooked my signature osso buco risotto, and I am a professional chef,
translation.it: Ho cucinato il risotto all'ossobuco e sono una chef,

translation.en: but if you just want gas-station-quality pizza--
No. I'm sorry.
It's just, I haven't had a family meal since...
translation.it: È che non mangio in famiglia da...

translation.en: Well, a long time.
Anyway...
this looks nice.
Thank you.
You know, that's not a bad idea. Maybe Mom could cook dinner for us every night.
translation.it: Non è una brutta idea. Mamma dovrebbe cucinare tutte le sere.

translation.en: And then we could eat together, as a family.
Sure, no problem.
Or what if we took, like, a family cooking class?
translation.it: E se facessimo dei corsi di cucina?

translation.en: You could literally teach us how to cook and we could take turns making the dinners.
translation.it: Potresti letteralmente insegnarci a cucinare, così faremmo a turno.

translation.en: That actually sounds kind of fun.
Cool.
And Dad used "literally" the right way.
-So how was your first day of school? -Pretty good.
I stole the driver's ed. car, and got a whole three blocks before they brought me down with a spike strip.
translation.it: Ho rubato una macchina e mi hanno bloccata con i chiodi.

translation.en: She's kidding.
You're kidding, right?
It's so hard to tell what's real and what's made up with you, Nick.
translation.it: È difficile capire cos'è vero con te.

translation.en: Speaking of which, I heard Jeremy was hoping to get a new car when he gets his license.
translation.it: So che Jeremy voleva una macchina al conseguimento della patente.

translation.en: Until you showed up, and we had to make sacrifices.
translation.it: Poi sei arrivata tu e dobbiamo fare sacrifici.

translation.en: Well, about that, I had a thought. I'm working at Liz's restaurant after school now.
translation.it: Mi è venuta un'idea. Lavoro al ristorante dopo scuola.

translation.en: Wait, what?
Surprise.
This girl can carry a freakish amount of cannelloni.
We'll talk later.
So maybe you could get a job, too, and buy your own car.
translation.it: Potresti lavorare anche tu e pagarti la macchina.

translation.en: Wait, like a "job" job, where I have to do stuff people don't wanna do?
translation.it: E fare cose che altri non vogliono fare?

translation.en: This sounds like a pretty good solution.
It's really smart, Nick.
Thank you so much.
You deserve it.
This calls for a celebration.
I saw some sparkling cider in the fridge.
translation.it: Ho visto del sidro in frigo.

translation.en: I hope that's okay.
Sure, sounds nice.
Let me go get it.
[Liz] Nick, do you need any help?
No, I'm good.
Well, here's to my new family.
Wait! I want to say something.
I know you've only been here a little while, Nick,
translation.it: So che sei qui da poco,

translation.en: but I feel like you coming to us, this is happening for a reason.
translation.it: ma credo ci sia un motivo dietro il tuo arrivo.

translation.en: Oh, it's definitely happening for a reason.
translation.it: Oh, di sicuro c'è un motivo.

translation.en: No, I mean, maybe this is exactly what we all need, to shake things up,
translation.it: Ci ha dato quello che ci serviva, una scossa

translation.en: make us realize how much we love each other.
translation.it: per farci capire quanto ci vogliamo bene.

translation.en: I'll drink to that.
Wait. I want to say something, too.
translation.it: Aspettate, voglio dire qualcosa anche io.

translation.en: I'll admit that I was unsure about you living with us, but I was wrong.
translation.it: Ammetto che ero incerta su di te, ma mi sbagliavo.

translation.en: You know, you kids could learn from this girl,
'cause she has faced hardship, and that has given her character.
translation.it: Ha affrontato tante cose che l'hanno resa forte.

translation.en: Thank you.
Should we drink to that?
Wait.
I want to say something, too.
I know you all know that helping people's my thing. As long as everyone hears about it.
translation.it: - Aiutare è la mia passione. - Basta che tutti lo sappiano.

translation.en: But I...
feel like Nick is the one helping me.
translation.it: ...sento che è Nick ad aiutare me.

translation.en: She's like the sister I never had.
translation.it: È la sorella che non ho mai avuto.

translation.en: Wow. That's actually really sweet.
So... drink?
Wait. I want to say something, too.
I guess, I'll admit, I was also unsure about Nick.
translation.it: Ammetto che ero incerto su Nick

translation.en: Am unsure.
But at the same time, I don't know...
if I'm being honest with myself, maybe I really am just afraid of sharing what I've got.
translation.it: se sono sincero con me stesso, forse avevo solo paura di condividere.

translation.en: Because the truth is...
I do have a lot.
Now, let's drink to that.
Wait!
I'm sorry. It's just...
you guys don't realize how lucky you are to have each other.
translation.it: Non capite quanto siete fortunati ad avere l'un l'altro.

translation.en: I guess it's not until you lose your family that you realize that...
translation.it: Solo quando perdi la famiglia capisci che...

translation.en: family is everything.
And even if you don't always get along,
translation.it: E anche se non andate sempre d'accordo,

translation.en: or you get on each other's nerves,
translation.it: o se vi date sui nervi,

translation.en: just knowing that your family is there...
somehow it just makes everything better.
Now let's drink before somebody else makes a speech.
No, wait!
What the hell was that?
I just saw a Band-Aid... in the bottle of cider...
translation.it: Ho visto un cerotto nella bottiglia,

translation.en: A used Band-Aid.
I'm sorry. I'll clean this up. Just...
stay right here.
[Sam] Well?
It's not the right time, Sam.
What do you mean, it's not the right time? We're down the street in a U-Haul.
translation.it: Cioè? Siamo qui sotto, su un camion dei traslochi.

translation.en: I just jumped the gun on calling it. But the truth is, we need to be patient here.
translation.it: Ho deciso di agire troppo presto. Dobbiamo essere pazienti.

translation.en: We can get a lot more than 50 grand if we play this right.
translation.it: Possiamo fare più di 50.000, se aspettiamo.

translation.en: How much more?
How does a million sound?
translation.it: Che ne dici di un milione?

translation.en: Ed works at a bank.
I can get passwords, account information.
And Liz owns a restaurant.
There's cash just lying around.
I saw it with my own eyes.
So let's not be stupid.
This is a long con.
Why jump at the easy money when we can take the whole enchilada?
translation.it: Perché prendere la ciliegina quando possiamo avere l'intera torta?

translation.en: You better be right.
Trust me.
[Nick] Who wants some gas-station-quality pizza?
Don't worry about Sam and Dorothy.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti di Sam e Dorothy.

translation.en: I can put them off as long as I need to.
Trust me.
They have no idea this isn't a random family.
translation.it: Non sanno che non è una famiglia a caso.

translation.en: Well, I'd better go.
I don't want them to get suspicious.
You stay safe, too.
I know, I know.
I love you, too, Dad.
